original_text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?
korean_text: 제자 중에서 서로 말하되 우리에게 말씀하신 바 조금 있으면 나를 보지 못하겠고 또 조금 있으면 나를 보리라 하시며 또 내가 아버지께로 감이라 하신 것이 무슨 말씀이냐 하고

sentences.original_text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들 중 몇 사람이 서로에게 말하기를

sentences.original_text: What is this that he saith unto us
A little while, and ye shall not see me
sentences.korean_translation: 조금 후면 너희가 나를 보지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and, Because I go to the Father?
